title: Pontoon Mount Self Dewatering Pump Rental
location: PТ. РАМA PERSADA NUSANTARA - SITE KPCS, EAST KALIMANTAN

info.title: Problem statement
info.value: A mining operation in East Kalimantan was experiencing persistent flooding in a remote excavation pit due to heavy seasonal rainfall and a rising groundwater table. Traditional dewatering methods were proving inefficient and required constant manual intervention.

info.title: Site Condition
info.value: Remote open-pit mining site with limited access, high sediment content in water, and fluctuating water levels. No stable ground surface for fixed pump installation.

info.title: Pump Used
info.value:
• Pump: 1000 GPM (3785 L/min)
  • Pump: 1000 GPM (3785 L/min)
  • Pump: 1000 GPM (3785 L/min)

info.title: Outcome
info.value: Effective and autonomous dewatering was achieved, maintaining pit access and operational uptime. The pontoon system ensured uninterrupted performance regardless of water level changes.

feedback.value: The pontoon-mounted pump performed beyond expectations. Minimal supervision was required, and the system handled high solids with ease. It significantly reduced our downtime during critical operations.
